document_data.name: Wound
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wound''''' was a [[divine]] [[necromancy]] [[spell]] that was granted to [[specialty priest]]s of [[Bhaal]], up until the [[Time of Troubles]]. It functioned in the same manner as ''[[cause serious wounds]]'' except that it could be cast up to {{SI|360|ft|long=yes}} away from its the target.
document_data.Components: The casting of this spell only required [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
